sentences.english: Post-simulation shows that the deserializer meets the design requirements.
sentences.chinese: 后仿真结果表明，本文设计的串并转换电路满足要求。

sentences.english: Some are like myself, working as a teacher, reading and writing, content with a simple life.
sentences.chinese: 有的和我一样当教书先生，读读写写满足简朴的生活。

sentences.english: He needed money to feed his addiction to gambling.
sentences.chinese: 他需要钱来满足他的赌瘾。

sentences.english: Then we Can achieve a fulfillment that no other living creature will ever know.
sentences.chinese: 那么我们就能取得别的生物所不能取得的满足感。

sentences.english: Being the youngest and spoilt, my with was granted.
sentences.chinese: 作为家中的老小被娇生惯养，我的愿望被满足了。

sentences.english: This gave the impression that the police were content simply to look on.
sentences.chinese: 这给了大众一种印象，警方仅仅满足于作壁上观。

sentences.english: Its structure function and its esthetics characteristic should be embodied.
sentences.chinese: 桥梁建筑首要满足其结构功能，还要体现其美学特性。

sentences.english: Nowadays people look to technology as an alternative source of satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 现在人们指望科技能成为满足感的另一个来源。

sentences.english: To learn is a great virtue, but to be content with what one knows is stupid.
sentences.chinese: 学习是一个巨大的美德，但满足于所知的就是愚蠢了。

sentences.english: Durge would take great satisfaction in being able to kill legions of his sworn enemies.
sentences.chinese: 德奇将从杀死整团整团的死敌中获得极大的满足。

sentences.english: But the water available here cannot meet the needs of all.
sentences.chinese: 但是这里可供使用的水并不能满足所有人的需要。

sentences.english: A hot beanbag may be just the cure you need.
sentences.chinese: 一个热的装着豆类的布袋正好能满足你的需要。

sentences.english: Satiated , it finally slept, alone in the void.
sentences.chinese: 终于他满足了，孤独地沉睡在虚空之海。

sentences.english: It actually has a much greater chance of fulfilling our stakeholder's needs.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，它还大大增加了满足出资方需要的机会。

sentences.english: So this characteristic satisfies the need of the E-GOV System.
sentences.chinese: 这种特性恰恰满足了电子政务系统开发的需要。

sentences.english: But some people are never happy, and overclocking is a must.
sentences.chinese: 但是一些人永远不会满足，所以超频就成为了必须。

definition: in keeping with/in accordance with/tallying with/in line with/to agree with/to accord with/to conform to/to correspond with/to manage/to handle
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
to attend simultaneously to two or more things/to balance (career and family, family and education etc)
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
to enjoy/to live it up/pleasure/CL:種|种[zhong3]
to like/fond of/to prefer/to love/one's tastes/preference
to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
